name: Quick, Survive
description:
Trailer About

Survive in a beautiful low-poly world, but with a catch!
Instead of gathering resources just for the sake of gathering, like you do in regular survival games, in Quick, Survive you have a limited time to gather and craft. When the timer is over, you'll have to fight a powerful boss using only the weapons you've managed to create!

Extras

Additionally, there is a secondary game mode you unlock when you get a certain high-score: "Demons". It's a little arcade mini-game added just for fun :) You can watch a video about it here.

Any problems?

The game shouldn't have any problems :)
...But if you do encounter a problem, feel free to contact me via my email (address can be found in my itch.io profile).

Note

This game is only available for Windows. I'm sorry, Mac and Linux users, but I don't want to distribute a file I didn't check. The Windows version was checked several times to ensure it's working properly, but I don't own a Mac/Linux computer, so I can't check if those files work.
